SEARCH
Package at.ac.tuwien.sepm.assignment.individual.service

Interface HorseService

All Known Implementing Classes:
HorseServiceImpl
public interface HorseService
Service for working with horses.

  • Method Details

    • allHorses

      Stream<HorseListDto> allHorses()
      Lists all horses stored in the system.
      Returns:
      list of all stored horses

    • update

      HorseDetailDto update(HorseDetailDto horse) throws NotFoundException, ValidationException, ConflictException
      Updates the horse with the ID given in horse with the data given in horse in the persistent data store.
      Parameters:
      horse - the horse to update
      Returns:
      he updated horse
      Throws:
      NotFoundException - if the horse with given ID does not exist in the persistent data store
      ValidationException - if the update data given for the horse is in itself incorrect (description too long, no name, …)
      ConflictException - if the update data given for the horse is in conflict the data currently in the system (owner does not exist, …)

    • getById

      HorseDetailDto getById(long id) throws NotFoundException
      Get the horse with given ID, with more detail information. This includes the owner of the horse, and its parents. The parents of the parents are not included.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the horse to get
      Returns:
      the horse with ID id
      Throws:
      NotFoundException - if the horse with the given ID does not exist in the persistent data store

    • create

      HorseDetailDto create(HorseCreateDto newHorse) throws ValidationException, ConflictException
      Create a new horse in the persistent data store.
      Parameters:
      newHorse - the data for the new horse
      Returns:
      the horse that was newly created in the persistent data store
      Throws:
      ValidationException - if Horse data do not pass the validation check
      ConflictException - if the data given for the creation of the horse are in conflict with existing data in database

    • delete

      void delete(long id) throws NotFoundException
      Delete a horse from the persistent data store.
      Parameters:
      id - to ID of the horse to delete
      Throws:
      NotFoundException - if the horse was not found in the persistent data store.

    • search

      Stream<HorseListDto> search(HorseSearchDto searchParameters)
      Search for horses in the persistent data store
      Parameters:
      searchParameters - the search parameters for the filtering
      Returns:
      List of all horses that pass the search parameters
